short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save videos and channels in YouTube

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
YT Skin is an extension/add on which saves videos and channels without logging in the google account.

𝐈𝐬𝐬𝐮𝐞
YouTube recommendation on home page gets turned off when watch history is turned off.

𝐒𝐨𝐥𝐮𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧
However, recommendations work fine if account is not logged in.
This extension gives the functionality to save the video and channel without the need of logging to the google account. 

𝐇𝐨𝐰 𝐭𝐨 𝐬𝐚𝐯𝐞 𝐯𝐢𝐝𝐞𝐨 𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐜𝐡𝐚𝐧𝐧𝐞𝐥?
Two buttons will be visible in the navbar of every YouTube video. Save button saves the video with its title and Subscribe button saves the channel.

𝐇𝐨𝐰 𝐭𝐨 𝐚𝐜𝐜𝐞𝐬𝐬 𝐭𝐡𝐞 𝐬𝐚𝐯𝐞𝐝 𝐯𝐢𝐝𝐞𝐨𝐬 𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐜𝐡𝐚𝐧𝐧𝐞𝐥𝐬?
Saved videos and channels can be accessed by clicking on the add on button.

𝐂𝐚𝐧 𝐈 𝐬𝐲𝐧𝐜 𝐭𝐡𝐞 𝐬𝐚𝐯𝐞𝐝 𝐯𝐢𝐝𝐞𝐨𝐬 𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐜𝐡𝐚𝐧𝐧𝐞𝐥𝐬 𝐚𝐜𝐫𝐨𝐬𝐬 𝐝𝐢𝐟𝐟𝐞𝐫𝐞𝐧𝐭 𝐛𝐫𝐨𝐰𝐬𝐞𝐫𝐬?
No. data can not be synced right now. However, I'm working on the feature. Meanwhile, saved data can be exported or imported in json format.

𝐂𝐫𝐞𝐝𝐢𝐭𝐬
Channel and video data is fetched from https://yt.lemnoslife.com APIs.

𝐒𝐨𝐮𝐫𝐜𝐞 𝐜𝐨𝐝𝐞
https://github.com/shivamsbajpai/yt-skin
